column2:
"Ooh, I just love that photon energy of yours.
It takes my breath away."

"You're quite a well-seasoned Ranger, aren't you?
You've really come a long long way since when
I first met you."

"Mm, that's just wonderful! So would you care to
join me in some delightful killing and carnage?"

"Now where should we go? Hm...
The \"Tunnels Probe\" mission should do.
No one will bother us down there."

"Two Rangers working together will be a nice
change of pace. Now, let's go have some fun. You know the drill: kill kill kill!"
